SEARCH
Package StochasticSimulation

Class Individual

java.lang.Object
StochasticSimulation.Individual
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Individual>
public class Individual extends Object implements Comparable<Individual>
This class represents an individual in a stochastic simulation. The Individual class encapsulates the properties and behaviors of an individual, including the matrix of patrol times, the distribution of systems among patrols, the comfort level, and the optimal patrol time. It implements the Comparable interface to allow comparison based on comfort level.

    • Individual

      public Individual(int[][] matrix, Random random)
      Constructor for Individual. Initializes the individual with a given matrix and randomizes the initial distribution of systems among patrols.
      Parameters:
      matrix - the matrix representing patrol times
      random - the Random object used for randomizing the distribution

      distribution - the specific distribution of systems among patrols
